name: Olden Retriever (Metroidvania Month 15) DEMO
description:
OLDEN RETRIEVER

--------

you are the dog.

you must get the sacred orb.

you must use your dog powers.

good luck, dog.

CONTROLS:

A and D on Keyboard or Left and Right on controller to move left and right

Other controls revealed through gameplay.

---------

https://freesound.org/people/crazymonke9/sounds/418105/

https://freesound.org/people/Robinhood76/sounds/425115/

Font used is Dogica by Roberto Mocci:
